subject: Attention: Please
body:
Attention: Please
Are you also aware that your Approved fund of $18,753 million dollars has been credited into your account, by FIRST BANK OF NIGERIA PLC and please I urge you to kindly go to your bank and reconfirm if this fund has reflected into your account and get back to me immediately to be sure.
NOTE: if the fund is not yet into your account (Please do not panic)  because there are a lot of changes in your file by the previous administration here but Please, 
Urgently Reconfirm your full banking details and 
copy of your drivers licence 
and your Cell phone number to reach out to you immediately.  
These might sound like phrases to you but it is a standing order that must be carried out in order to sanitize the image of our dear nation (Nigeria) outside the global world.
 Yours Faithfully:                
 Dr. Frank Kelley
 DIRECTOR (WIRE TRANSFER)
 FIRST BANK OF NIGERIA PLC

subject: Re: Attention: Please
body:
Hello Dr. Frank Kelley,

Thank you for your message. It's quite surprising to hear about this approved fund of million dollars. I must say, it's not every day that one receives such news.

I'm curious though, how did this come about? I don't recall having any dealings with the FIRST BANK OF NIGERIA PLC. Could you provide more details on this matter?

As for my banking details and driver's license, I'm afraid I can't share those online due to security reasons. However, I'd be happy to continue our conversation and learn more about this situation.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Nancy
